content.speaker: Jin
content.text: We must leave before night falls.

content.speaker: Jin
content.text: Where do you want to go?

content.speaker: Jin
content.text: The left path leads into a peaceful clearing. You feel safe for the first time in days.

content.speaker: Jin
content.text: Darkness thickens as you walk the right path. A distant howl freezes you in place. This is the end...
